attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that the implementation of codex alimentarius as a global enforceable regulation removes the right of the individual to choose for ourselves what minerals vitamins and supplements we require in our diet.
If codex aliementaruis is implemented as a global regulation, then we believe that it will only serve to denature further the foods we consume causing the nation’s health to suffer, and a further burden on the NHS.we reserve the right to choose for ourselves if we want these products in our diets. Consequently.
 we call upon the Government to oppose the implementation of codex aliementarius thereby protecting our human right to select good nutritional food for ourselves.
   Codex alimentarius commission strategic vision statement. States:
their goal:
the commission will develop international agreed standards and related texts for use in domestic regulation and international trade and food
